channel.title: Online pdf issue with printing
channel.description: So at work when I am trying to print a document like from an online pdf(in Chrome, have not tested other browsers pdf readers) I can tell it to print in black and white...however it is still printing in color even after I select black and white. Any ideas? I can tell it to send it to the adobe reader, have it print in black and white just fine though so it makes me think it's a browser issue?

item.title: Online pdf issue with printing
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:4, topic:514715”][quote author=Cruel Truth link=topic=632965.msg4278134#msg4278134 date=1365196057]

Towards the bottom of Chrome’s print page is a link to use the System print dialog. Try using that to make it black and white
[/quote]will try it at work Monday morning ( at home now ) I do see it on my home browser though thanks!

Trying to pinpoint if its an issue with Chrome’s printer interface, or printing from Chrome itself. I couldn’t seem to recreate the error in my tests[/quote]thanks your idea worked :), went to preferences, then to color, told it to print in black and it did it.

Read full topic

item.title: Online pdf issue with printing

item.description:

Towards the bottom of Chrome’s print page is a link to use the System print dialog. Try using that to make it black and white
[/quote]will try it at work Monday morning ( at home now ) I do see it on my home browser though thanks![/quote]
Trying to pinpoint if its an issue with Chrome’s printer interface, or printing from Chrome itself. I couldn’t seem to recreate the error in my tests
